dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT b.shp_loc, TO_CHAR(ROUND((SUM(jan_l) / (SUM(jan_t) + 0.00000000001)) * 100,2),'990.00') || '%' jan_p, TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(jan_l),3),'999999990.000') jan_t, TO_CHAR(ROUND((SUM(feb_l) / (SUM(feb_t) + 0.00000000001)) * 100,2),'990.00') || '%' feb_p, TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(feb_l),3),'999999990.000') feb_t, TO_CHAR(ROUND((SUM(mar_l) / (SUM(mar_t) + 0.00000000001)) * 100,2),'990.00') || '%' mar_p, TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(mar_l),3),'999999990.000') mar_t, TO_CHAR(ROUND((SUM(apr_l) / (SUM(apr_t) + 0.00000000001)) * 100,2),'990.00') || '%' apr_p, TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(apr_l),3),'999999990.000') apr_t, TO_CHAR(ROUND((SUM(may_l) / (SUM(may_t) + 0.00000000001)) * 100,2),'990.00') || '%' may_p, TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(may_l),3),'999999990.000') may_t, TO_CHAR(ROUND((SUM(jun_l) / (SUM(jun_t) + 0.00000000001)) * 100,2),'990.00') || '%' jun_p, TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(jun_l),3),'999999990.000') jun_t, TO_CHAR(ROUND((SUM(jul_l) / (SUM(jul_t) + 0.00000000001)) * 100,2),'990.00') || '%' jul_p, TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(jul_l),3),'999999990.000') jul_t, TO_CHAR(ROUND((SUM(aug_l) / (SUM(aug_t) + 0.00000000001)) * 100,2),'990.00') || '%' aug_p, TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(aug_l),3),'999999990.000') aug_t, TO_CHAR(ROUND((SUM(sep_l) / (SUM(sep_t) + 0.00000000001)) * 100,2),'990.00') || '%' sep_p, TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(sep_l),3),'999999990.000') sep_t, TO_CHAR(ROUND((SUM(oct_l) / (SUM(oct_t) + 0.00000000001)) * 100,2),'990.00') || '%' oct_p, TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(oct_l),3),'999999990.000') oct_t, TO_CHAR(ROUND((SUM(nov_l) / (SUM(nov_t) + 0.00000000001)) * 100,2),'990.00') || '%' nov_p, TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(nov_l),3),'999999990.000') nov_t, TO_CHAR(ROUND((SUM(dec_l) / (SUM(dec_t) + 0.00000000001)) * 100,2),'990.00') || '%' dec_p, TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(dec_l),3),'999999990.000') dec_t FROM (SELECT a.shp_loc, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 1 AND a.sail_date > a.late_delivery_date THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) jan_l, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 1 THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) jan_t, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 2 AND a.sail_date > a.late_delivery_date THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) feb_l, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 2 THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)),0) feb_t, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 3 AND a.sail_date > a.late_delivery_date THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) mar_l, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 3 THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) mar_t, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 4 AND a.sail_date > a.late_delivery_date THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) apr_l, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 4 THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) apr_t, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 5 AND a.sail_date > a.late_delivery_date THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) may_l, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 5 THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) may_t, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 6 AND a.sail_date > a.late_delivery_date THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) jun_l, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 6 THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) jun_t, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 7 AND a.sail_date > a.late_delivery_date THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) jul_l, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 7 THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) jul_t, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 8 AND a.sail_date > a.late_delivery_date THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) aug_l, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 8 THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) aug_t, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 9 AND a.sail_date > a.late_delivery_date THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) sep_l, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 9 THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) sep_t, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 10 AND a.sail_date > a.late_delivery_date THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) oct_l, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 10 THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) oct_t, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 11 AND a.sail_date > a.late_delivery_date THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) nov_l, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 11 THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) nov_t, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 12 AND a.sail_date > a.late_delivery_date THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) dec_l, SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 12 THEN a.total_net_weight ELSE 0 END)) dec_t FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sref.shipment_refnum_value shp_loc, s.shipment_gid, s.total_net_weight, s.sail_date, obl.late_delivery_date FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_line obl ON oob.order_base_gid = obl.order_base_gid INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND oob.order_base_xid like 'S%' AND EXISTS (SELECT ssu.s_ship_unit_gid FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL) AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'YYYY')) = TO_NUMBER(:YEAR)) a GROUP BY a.shp_loc, a.sail_date, a.late_delivery_date) b GROUP BY b.shp_loc ORDER BY b.shp_loc
